channel.title: Regression on Pritpal Singh
channel.description: Recent content in Regression on Pritpal Singh

item.title: IPL Win Probability Prediction
item.description: Have you ever checked the live score of any cricket match on google? I bet you have. And if you are a cricket fan, you would have noticed google offers a live win probability prediction for any cricket match. My inner child (and my 2rd yr Minor Project Deadline) motivated me to develop an end-to-end machine learning project using Python to predict the probability of an IPL cricket team winning a match given an instance of the match.
